"},"buyBond(uint256,int256,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_amountIn":"is negative if specified in zcb quantity"}},"buyBondLevered(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"the marketmanager should take custody of the quantity bought with leverage and instead return notes of the levered position  TODO do + instead of creating new positions and implied prob cumulative ","params":{"_amountIn":"(in collateral) already accounts for the leverage, so the actual amount manager is transferring is _amountIn/_leverage "}},"coverBondShort(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_amountIn":"is amount of short trader is willing to cover "}},"deactivateMarket(uint256,bool,bool,uint256)":{"params":{"resolve":"is true when instrument does not resolve prematurely"}},"sellBond(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_amountIn":"quantity in longZCB "}},"setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256,uint256)":{"details":"calculates market driven s from utilization rate. If u-r high,  then s should be low, as 1) it disincentivizes  managers to approving as more proportion of the profit goes to the LP, and 2) disincentivizes the borrower  to borrow as it lowers approved principal and increases interest rate "},"shortBond(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_amountIn":": amount of short trader is willing to buy","_priceLimit":": slippage tolerance on trade"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"DeactivatedMarket(uint256,bool,bool,uint256)":{"notice":"used to transition from reputationphases "}},"kind":"user","methods":{"approveMarket(uint256)":{"notice":"main approval function called by controller"},"buyBond(uint256,int256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"main entry point for longZCB buys "},"buyBondLevered(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"for managers that are a) meet certain reputation threshold and b) choose to be more capital efficient with their zcb purchase. "},"claimFunnel(uint256,uint16,uint256)":{"notice":"general limitorder claim + liquidity provision funnels used post-assessment,  which will be recorded if necessary  param type: 1 if open long, 2 if close long, 3 if open short, 4 if close short type 5: partially claim , TODO do all possible trading functions "},"deactivateMarket(uint256,bool,bool,uint256)":{"notice":"Called when market resolves "},"denyMarket(uint256)":{"notice":"called by validator only"},"getCurrentMarketPhase(uint256)":{"notice":"returns whether current market is in phase  1: onlyReputable, which also means market is in assessment 2: not onlyReputable but in asseessment  3: in assessment but canbeapproved  4: post assessment(accepted or denied), amortized liquidity "},"getMaxLeverage(address)":{"notice":"returns the manager's maximum leverage "},"getTraderBudget(uint256,address)":{"notice":"get trade budget = f(reputation), returns in collateral_dec sqrt for now"},"issuePoolBond(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"after assessment, let managers buy newly issued longZCB if the instrument is pool based  funds + funds * levFactor will be directed to the instrument "},"newMarket(uint256,address,address,address,string,bool)":{"notice":"parameters have to be set prior "},"redeem(uint256)":{"notice":"trader will redeem entire balance of ZCB Needs to be called at maturity, market needs to be resolved first(from controller)"},"redeemDeniedMarket(uint256,bool)":{"notice":"called by traders when market is denied before approval TODO ??? if the market is denied, this function is called and everything is redeemed  validator will need to call this on denial + isLong = true to redeem their collateral."},"redeemPoolLongZCB(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"when a manager redeems a poollongzcb, redeemAmount*levFactor are automatically  withdrawn from the instrument"},"redeemShortZCB(uint256)":{"notice":"called by short buyers when market is resolved  "},"sellBond(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"longZCB sells  "},"setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"list of parameters in this system for each market, should vary for each instrument "},"tradeCallBack(uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"called by pool when buying, transfers funds from trader to pool "},"validatorApprove(uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"called when the validator votes to approve the market => stakes vt + recieves discounted ZCB the staked amount goes to the controller while the discounted ZCB goes to the market approveMarket(uint256).details: if market is alive and market is not during assessment, it is approved.

params._amountIn: is negative if specified in zcb quantity

buyBondLevered(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: the marketmanager should take custody of the quantity bought with leverage and instead return notes of the levered position  TODO do + instead of creating new positions and implied prob cumulative

params._amountIn: (in collateral) already accounts for the leverage, so the actual amount manager is transferring is _amountIn/_leverage
is amount of short trader is willing to cover

params.resolve: is true when instrument does not resolve prematurely

setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: calculates market driven s from utilization rate. If u-r high,  then s should be low, as 1) it disincentivizes  managers to approving as more proportion of the profit goes to the LP, and 2) disincentivizes the borrower  to borrow as it lowers approved principal and increases interest rate

params._amountIn: : amount of short trader is willing to buy

approveMarket(uint256).notice: main approval function called by controller

buyBond(uint256,int256,uint256,bytes).notice: main entry point for longZCB buys

buyBondLevered(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: for managers that are a) meet certain reputation threshold and b) choose to be more capital efficient with their zcb purchase.

claimFunnel(uint256,uint16,uint256).notice: general limitorder claim + liquidity provision funnels used post-assessment,  which will be recorded if necessary  param type: 1 if open long, 2 if close long, 3 if open short, 4 if close short type 5: partially claim , TODO do all possible trading functions

getCurrentMarketPhase(uint256).notice: returns whether current market is in phase  1: onlyReputable, which also means market is in assessment 2: not onlyReputable but in asseessment  3: in assessment but canbeapproved  4: post assessment(accepted or denied), amortized liquidity

getTraderBudget(uint256,address).notice: get trade budget = f(reputation), returns in collateral_dec sqrt for now

issuePoolBond(uint256,uint256).notice: after assessment, let managers buy newly issued longZCB if the instrument is pool based  funds + funds * levFactor will be directed to the instrument

newMarket(uint256,address,address,addres.notice: parameters have to be set prior

redeem(uint256).notice: trader will redeem entire balance of ZCB Needs to be called at maturity, market needs to be resolved first(from controller)

redeemDeniedMarket(uint256,bool).notice: called by traders when market is denied before approval TODO ??? if the market is denied, this function is called and everything is redeemed  validator will need to call this on denial + isLong = true to redeem their collateral.

redeemPoolLongZCB(uint256,uint256).notice: when a manager redeems a poollongzcb, redeemAmount*levFactor are automatically  withdrawn from the instrument

redeemShortZCB(uint256).notice: called by short buyers when market is resolved

setParameters((uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: list of parameters in this system for each market, should vary for each instrument

tradeCallBack(uint256,bytes).notice: called by pool when buying, transfers funds from trader to pool

validatorApprove(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: called when the validator votes to approve the market => stakes vt + recieves discounted ZCB the staked amount goes to the controller while the discounted ZCB goes to the market manager.
